title: Out of all the old champions, Blitzcrank definitely needs a Voice Over update
body: His voice says **'terminator' **but his bio says **'lovable hero'**. I don't think he needs VGU right now as his abilities are pretty unique and still up to standard and his texture update made him much better to look at.

replies.body: The first two are the sound effects for his laugh and his rocket grab, the last one is self explanatory given the two previous ones.
He needs more lines about his dating service, that's for sure
